page.title: 11Le Pinacle
page.content: Neolithic people lived there 5000 years ago.The last event recorded was probably the building of a Gallo-Roman temple . The pinnacle itself is a giant stone crag some 200 feet tall.In Neolithic times, forested land stretched out below the site.You can find remains from Neolithic, Bronze and Iron age times. The people who lived there left because there were many sand storms and all the sand covered their houses. The Pinnacle is a naturally eroded stone.It was probably used as a place of worship. At the bottom of the Pinnacle there is dolerite rock.As Dolerite is softer than granite the waves have made a little ledge where the dolerite is and undercut the cliffs.
